name: Dark Escape (Ramohaku)
description:
You are escaping from something... You don't know what it is, just escape! Follow the signs and choose the right path.

This is the type of a game where you must be very percieptive. You have to match the correct sign to the given one and not choose the wrong ones.

How to play:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Look at the sign at the top of the screen and choose the corridors that show the same sign.

Have a blast!
